data.title: Batcast
data.text:
A collection of our long running bATcast! Scroll down for older episodes!

What Would Jello Do? #118: Joe Biden is out, Kamala is in, but is it enough?

Joe Biden is out, Kamala is in, but is it enough? Jello lays out his ideas and what the Democrats need to do to prevent another tRump term and stopping Project 2025!

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word series by Jello Biafra on the Alternative Tentacles Records YouTube channel. Like and subscribe for more!

Jello Biafra's Renegade Roundtable is an ongoing podcast hosted by Jello Biafra. Subscribe anywhere you listen to podcasts.

WHAT WOULD JELLO DO? PART 117: DEMOCRAT STRATEGY

In this episode of WWJD, Jello talks about what the Democratic Party, mostly what Joe Biden, needs to do if they want a chance at winning in November.

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word series by Jello Biafra on the Alternative Tentacles Records YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@alternativetentacles

Jello Biafra's Renegade Roundtable is an ongoing podcast hosted by Jello Biafra. Subscribe anywhere you listen to podcasts.

Edited by Chris Reject

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/batcast-217.m4a

THE DARTS "BOOMERANG"

Tsunami Bomb's Dominic Davi sits down with The Darts vocalist/keyboardist Nicole Laurenne and bassist Christina Nunez to talk about their new album "Boomerang", what it's like to be on Alternative Tentacles, working with Jello Biafra, touring forever, an upcoming NEW release with Tsunami Bomb, and why a Farfisa is an absolute tank! Also hear the new tracks off "Boomerang" including Hang Around, Hell Yeah, The Middle Of Nowhere, and Welcome To My Doldrums!

Pick up the new album "Boomerang" by The Darts streaming everywhre and in stores now!

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/batcast-206_-_ThedartsBoomerang.m4a

What is Going On? - Alternative Tentacles Update with DOMINIC DAVI

Dominic Davi (Tsunami Bomb) sits down to review the last few months of Alternative Tentacles Records! Talking about the launch of the new website, the new Patreon, Krampus Night 2023, the state of represses, and new releases the label has been involved in.

Hear tracks from ArnoCorps, NomeansNo, Jello Biafra and the Raunch and Soul All-Stars, Sandrider, The Darts, Jello Biafra with Motorpsycho, and DFMK!

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast205.m4a

Freya Hausman - General Manager of Alternative Tentacles Records

This week Dominic Davi (Tsunami Bomb, Loud Graves) sits down with the new General Manager of Alternative Tentacles Records, Freya Hausman. They talk about how Feya got started as an intern at A.T. years ago, running her own label, interviewing with Jello Biafra, and taking over the label. They talk about upcoming plans for the label, the status of the 7" Club, the coming Patreon plans, and more!

Featuring the music of Tribe 8, Wheelchair Sports Camp, and Westley Willis

Learn more about Tribe 8:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tribe_8

Hear more Wheelchair Sports Camp:

https://wheelchairsportscamp.bandcamp.com/

Hear more Westley Willis:

https://wesleywillis.bandcamp.com/

Find out more about all things Alternative Tentacles Records at:

https://alternativetentacles.com

Find out more about Dominic Davi at:

https://tsunamibomb.net

https://www.3gigspodcast.com

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast_204-audio.m4a

The Return of The bATcast with Dominic Davi

Dominic Davi (bassist for Tsunami Bomb) returns to the bATcast after a long absence, to give you the lastest news on all things Alternative Tentacles Records! He answers questions submitted by fans from the facebook group that cover when particular records are coming out, the status of the 7" Club, and humming tunes into our answering machine. He also spins tracks from SPANK MACHINE, THE DARTS, MINISTRY, TSUNAMI BOMB, and LEGENDARY SHACK SHAKERS! The bATcast is back!

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast_82523_Audio.m4a

VINYL-GEDDON

In this episode of the Alternative Tentacles bATcast, Kevin None and Dominic Davi (from Tsunami Bomb) return to spin records and answer your questions about AT!

Track Listing:

"God Forsaken Town"

Alternative Tentacles Radio: Spring 2022

THE RETURN OF AT RADIO!

Give your day a background soundtrack as DJ Kevin None & DJ Nina spin records from the AT catalog in this very special Spring Sale themed episode!

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/AT_Spring_22_SALE.m4a

What Would Jello Do? Part 102: The Trucker Protests

On the latest episode of What Would Jello Do?, Jello looks at the recent Trucker Protests. Talking about a few points that the media hasn't been mentioning enough.

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit https://alternativetentacles.com​

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-199-WWJD102.m4a

Alternative Tentacles Update 2022

Dominic Davi, Kevin None, and Nina sit down and play tracks from the latest releases from Alternative Tentacles Records artists, Spindrift, Legendary Shack Shakers, Itchy-O, and more! They also answer live questions from listeners!

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-198-ATUpdate_.m4a

What Would Jello Do? Part 97: The Great Betrayal (part 1)

Joe Biden has pulled American Troops out of Afghanistan. While Americans did need to leave, what are the implications of this decision and how much did "The Blob" influence the way this was brought about?

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit https://alternativetentacles.com​

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-193-_WWJD-Afghan1.mp3

What Would Jello Do? Part 96: Texas

With the Supreme Court allowing the Texas Abortion law to go in effect while it’s legality is still being debated, this has huge implications across the board for women, and for us all.

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit https://alternativetentacles.com​

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-192-_WWJD-Texas.mp3

Jello Biafra - The First Great Betrayal

"This isn’t our first “Great Betrayal” of Afghanistan. We did it in the 1990’s too!" - Jello Biafra

In the wake of the United States' complete withdrawal from Afghanistan, we ask you to step back to 2002, and Jello Biafra's classic spoken word album, Virus 290 "Machine Gun In The Clown's Hand". Jello talks about some of the American policies that has lead us to this moment. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED LISTENING

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-191-TheFirstGreatBetrayal_-_82021_8.35_PM.mp3

What Would Jello Do? Part 95: The California Recall

There are ballots arriving in mailboxes all over California this week, to consider the fate of Governor Gavin Newscum. However what happens if he is removed from office? Is the outcome far worse? How does Dianne Feinstein play into all this?

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit https://alternativetentacles.com​

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-190-CaliforniaRecall.mp3

"Where's My Order?" - Update on the Spring Sale orders!

The AT staff pulls back the curtain on the bATcave, and gives updates on what has delayed some of the orders from the Spring Sale. We also learn about Pi_Pi! Songs played:

Jello Biafra & The Guantanamo School Of Medine

"Blunder Blubber"

Tsunami Bomb

Guantanamo School Of Medicine - Tea Party Revenge Porn Interview

Alternative Tentacles own Anne-Marie Anderson, sits down with her old friends Ralph Spright, Larry Boothroyd, and Jason Willer... collectively known as Guantanamo School of Medicine (with Jello Biafra). They talk about the new album, "Tea Party Revenge Porn" and just what it's like to be in a band with Jello!

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Anne-marie-interview-GSM_-_Final.m4a

What Would Jello Do? Part 92: THE RETURN OF MASS SHOOTINGS

Mass shootings are back with a vengeance. Jello examines the causes of these shootings and what we should do about it.

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit https://alternativetentacles.com

$10 LP SALE SPECIAL

Kevin None continues his journey through the Alternative Tentacles discography, this time focusing on some of the LPs that will be for sale this weekend in our online store!

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/AT_LP_SALE.m4a

$1 CD SALE SPECIAL

Kevin None returns to highlight some choice cuts from the Alternative Tentacles discography, and give you some ideas of what CDs to pick up from the upcoming sale this weekend (or any time)! Some great tracks played on this one.

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/AT_CD_SALE.m4a

This is PART 3 of a 3 part series!

Jello Biafra discusses the recent Capital riots and where we should go from here.

What Would Jello Do? Part 88: What Joe Biden Should Do Now

Since we are on the subject of Joe Biden, here are a few suggestions on things he could start doing right now. Before he takes office on January 20th, in order to get things moving in the right direction.

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit https://alternativetentacles.com

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/WWJDpart87-12-11-20.m4a

What Would Jello Do? Part 87: What Biden Should Do On January 20th

Everyone is so excited about Biden! We shall see. A few suggestions on how Biden can actually change some things for the better as soon as he becomes president on January 20th.

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit https://alternativetentacles.com

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/WWJDpart87.m4a

What Would Jello Do? Part 86: Protect The Vote

Jello Biafra looks at what the Trump led Republicans are preparing to do to make voting as difficult as possible and steal this election.

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit https://alternativetentacles.com

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-178_.m4a

What Would Jello Do? Part 85: Vote Defense!

Live from his new hidden office, Jello Biafra address Trump's recent comments regarding Proud Boys and how we can keep everyone safe when voting in November.

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit https://alternativetentacles.com

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-177.m4a

Jello Biafra & Greg Palast

Two great voices from Alternative Tentacles: Greg Palast, author and investigative journalist whose credits include the BBC and The Guardian, and whose recent book "How Trump Stole 2020" sits down with Jello Biafra for a fantastic discussion. Huge thank you to Greg Palast for allowing us to use this interview as a bATcast episode!

For more information on Alternative Tentacles: https://alternativetentacles.com

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-176_-_92720_1.55_PM.m4a

Interview with Jeff Dean of Dead Ending

In a segment now called "Between Two Bassists", Christina Madcap bassist of The Darts and Dominic Davi bassist of Tsunami Bomb, sit down with Jeff Dean! Guitarist for Dead Ending who have just released their latest EP, "American Virus"!

They share stories about the formation of Dead Ending, how "American Virus" came together, collecting records, the ultimate cover songs, the most embarrassing moments on stage, and what it's like to be on Alternative Tentacles Records.

For more information on Dead Ending

https://www.facebook.com/DeadEnding

For more information on Alternative Tentacles: https://alternativetentacles.com

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-175-DE_.m4a

What Would Jello Do? Part 84: Rushmore Envy

Things are getting weirder and weirder, Trump amok actually asked the governor of South Dakota about getting his face on Mount Rushmore...

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit https://alternativetentacles.com

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-173_.m4a

Interview with L.A. Machina

Dominic Davi (Tsunami Bomb) sits down with Rikki Styxx, Suzi Moon, and Michelle Michelle Balderrama of L.A. Machina! They talk about their new debut 7" "Welcome To The Machina", how the pandemic made them get creative, their two music videos, and how the band came to be!

For more information on L.A. Machina:

https://machinaband.com/

For more information on Alternative Tentacles: https://alternativetentacles.com

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-174-LAMachina.m4a

What Would Jello Do? Part 83: United States Post Office

Jello talks about the attempts by the Trump administration to pull the plug on the United States Postal Office, what is the underlying cause of the issue, what the end of the USPS will mean, and why Obama and Biden are also to blame for the situation we are now in.

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit https://alternativetentacles.com

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-172_.m4a

Interview with The Darts (US)

Dominic Davi (Tsunami Bomb) sits down with Nicole Laurenne, Christina Madcap, and Meliza Jackson from The Darts! They talk about how the band came together, how they are surviving the pandemic, the process behind their album, "I Like You But Not Like That", and most exciting of all... what's coming next!

For more information on The Darts:

https://www.facebook.com/thedartsUS/

For more information on Alternative Tentacles: https://alternativetentacles.com

What Would Jello Do? Part 76: JARED! WHAT ARE WE GOING TO DO NOW?!?

Jello Biafra latest spoken word, as States prepare to reopen despite the mounting death tolls and against the warnings of health experts, Donald Trump’s administration seems more lost than ever.

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit alternativetentacles.com

Between the dangerously surreal race to reopen and Donald Trump's recent suggestions, Jello has a few choice words in response.

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit alternativetentacles.com

Home Arrest Live 2 - The Neverending Plague

4/22/20- It's been a few weeks now, and Hosts Dominic, Kevin None, Nadine, Just Chris, Totally Amber, and Anne-Marie return to update each other on the extended stay at home, but talk about Tiger King, the music industry, the Western States Pact, all while spinning some tracks from the AT discography.

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-162.mp3

What Would Jello Do? Part 74 - Disaster Capitalism

The Shelter In Place Order continues and while we try to prevent the spread of COVID-19, Donald Trump and his cronies engage in Disaster Capitalism, and that's not all. Jello Biafra tackles this and more on his latest episode of "What Would Jello Do?"

What Would Jello Do? is an informal spoken word video series by Jello Biafra. For more information on Jello Biafra, visit https://alternativetentacles.com

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-161.m4a

Home Arrest Live - COVID-19 Edition

3/26/20 - The Shelter in Place order to combat the spread of COVID-19 is in place so using Facetime hosts Dominic Davi, Anne-Marie, Nadine, Kevin None, Just Chris, and Totally Amber discuss their experiences in their homes, and with recent closures.

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-160_-_COVID19.m4a

Jello Biafra - Message From Our Sponsor 2020

Jello Biafra updates his classic monologue, “Message From Our Sponsor” from his first spoken word album, “No More Cocoons” as a BRAND NEW spoken word track for 2020. Available for download on bandcamp: https://jellobiafra.bandcamp.com/track/message-from-our-sponsor-2020

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/JB-MFOS-2020.m4a

What Would Jello Do? Part 72 & 73 - Jello Biafra Spoken Word

3/12/20: We've combined the two latest episodes of Jello Biafra's spoken word YouTube series, "What Would Jello Do?" that he had uploaded together into one podcast episode! Jello addresses the many reasons Trump could be impeached on a bi-monthly basis by Congress, and then delves into the Coronavirus pandemic, along with suggestions for custom virus masks.

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-158.m4a

The Good, The Bad, and The COVID-19

2/28/20: Dominic, Nadine, Anne-Marie, and Just Chris talk about a number of subjects and spin some tracks! COVID-19, Starting a band, The loss of Th'Inbred's singer, and... well Dick-Pizza.

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-157_.m4a

156: The World/Inferno Friendship Society - All Borders Are Porous To Cats

2/14/20: The World/Inferno Friendship Society stop in at the Batcave while on their tour supporting their brand new album, "All Borders Are Porous To Cats"! Pour yourself a glass of wine, put your feet up, and hear about what it's like to play the new songs, life on the road, and if there is a used condom on the floor of the Batcave or not.

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-156-WIFS_.m4a

155: The Impeachment was for YOU

Dominic, Anne-Marie, and Nadine return to usher in the new year with a review of the latest and greatest from Alternative Tentacles. Plus a review of the Impeachment and "Acquittal", including the mess in Iowa.

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-155.m4a

154: A.T. FEST WRAP-UP AND HOW TO SURVIVE MODERN POLITICS

12/31/19: For the final bATcast of 2019, Dominic, Just Chris, Nadine, Totally Amber, and Anne-Marie get together to discuss the recent Alternative Tentacles Fest and quite literally how to survive modern politics. From Trump antics to vile online hatred, how do you continue engaging when everything feels so bleak?

Also everything from White Claws, Star Wars, Boob reductions, and a brand new track by The World/Inferno Friendship Society! Don't miss this one!

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/154-Batcast_.m4a

153: Tentacle Fest!

11/19/19: Dominic, Just Chris, Nadine, and introducing Kristee get together to talk about streaming channels, shower scares, crazy trees, and chainsaw welding men on a roof, but ALSO they review the bands performing at TENTACLE FEST! Featuring The World/Inferno Friendship Society, ArnoCorps, Tsunami Bomb, Victim's Family, and Itchy-O! Also a song by Alice Donut who are not playing, but we wish they were!

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/153-Batcast_-_111819_10.57_PM.m4a.mp3

152: Top 10 Scariest Album Covers At Alternative Tentacles

10/31/19: "Just" Chris and Dominic Davi (Tsunami Bomb) are joined by "Totally" Amber for a special Halloween countdown! The Top 10 Totally Scariest Album Covers by Totally Amber! We had her pick the albums that scared her the most, then we told her about them and played a song from each! Do you agree with her list? Listen and find out! Happy Halloween!

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-152.m4a

151: If the Spaghetti Sticks You Know it's Done

10/4/19: Tsunami Bomb's Dominic Davi, Nadine, "Just" Chris, and Kevin None get together to get the podcast back up to speed. They discuss environmental issues, Tsunami Bomb's new album "The Spine That Binds", the upcoming Tentacle Fest celebrating 40 years of Alternative Tentacles Records, the Trump melt down, and nicknames. Buckle up Buttercup, this one's a ride!

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-151.m4a

150: Jello Biafra and the Iowa Caucus

8/31/19: John Gaps III from USA Photo Iowa interviews Jello Biafra about the Iowa Caucus, and a lot more.

https://traffic.libsyn.com/secure/batcast/Batcast-150_.m4a

149: This Podcast Is NOT Brought To You By...

8/17/19: Nadine, Dominic, Just Chris sit down with Kevin None and special guest Keta to talk about the recent CD Sale, White Supremacy in the United States government, and the Immigrant Experience. Featuring the music of Westley Willis, Jello Biafra and the Guantanamo School of Medicine, and The Bellrays.
